channel.title: Uploading a client or server?
channel.description: Alright well i just got my new client working, and this is the first time i have tried to upload something onto uppit or megaupload, but when i try to upload it and i click the file, it opens the file and i have to select a single file, i cannot select a folder. Help?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 06, 2008, 05:30:45 PM[/size][hr]Nevermind =P

item.title: Uploading a client or server?
item.dc:creator: @Bloody_Wolf Bloody Wolf
item.description:
@Bloody_Wolf wrote:

Alright well i just got my new client working, and this is the first time i have tried to upload something onto uppit or megaupload, but when i try to upload it and i click the file, it opens the file and i have to select a single file, i cannot select a folder. Help?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 06, 2008, 05:30:45 PM[/size][hr]Nevermind =P
